snippet: By cutting back on early voting, the state has taken another egregious step to impose barriers for citizens who tend to vote Democratic.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Republican lawmakers in Ohio for cutbacks to early voting, saying moves are intended to disenfranchise urban, largely Democratic voters; supports American Civil Liberties Union lawsuit claiming that new limitations violate the Voting Rights Act.
lead_paragraph: By cutting back on early voting, the state has taken another egregious step to impose barriers for citizens who tend to vote Democratic.
